title: Lamb shank casserole
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '1 pinch chopped fresh rosemary', '1 pinch chopped fresh dill (optional)', '4 lamb shanks', '200ml red wine', '150ml meat stock, your choice', '2 bay leaves', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']
